page.title: 03Past And Present In Woolton
page.content: The centre of our area is Woolton {village}which has an entry in the Domesday Book! Many of the buildings are hundreds of years old. Woolton Hall, a Georgian Manor House, is now a licensed restaurant. The village fete is still an annual affair and well supported by the residents. The sandstone from the{quarry}was used in the building of Liverpool Anglican{Cathedral}and all the Woolton churches. Much of the area is wide open spaces of parkland used as recreation grounds. There are also two golf courses - Allerton Municipal Golf Course and Woolton Golf Club. Woolton village is a busy shopping area. In 1982 Sainsbury's new shopping precinct was opened here. Some small shops have been put out of business because of this. ANTHONY HORSFALL (9)
